derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : via French from Latin agilis, from agere 'do'

encyclopedia.content: 公司 Agile Software公司于1995年创立于美国圣荷西，Agile是第一家专为电子制造业设计供应链标准模式的PLM（生命周期管理软件）厂商。 Oracle Agile的愿景是 “Deliver solutions that help companies work with their customers and suppliers to build better, more profitable products faster.” Agile软件用于全程跟踪企业产品。PLM(产品生命周期管理)解决的是企业协同设计的问题，也就是在产品生命周期的各个环节使用同一种

entry.def: Someone who is agile can move quickly and easily.

example.ex: At 20 years old he was not as agile as he is now.
example.tran: 20岁时他并不如现在这般矫健。

entry.def: If you have an agile mind, you think quickly and intelligently.

example.ex: She was quick-witted and had an extraordinarily agile mind.
example.tran: 她机智聪慧，思维极为敏捷。

sentences.sentence: "the old dog was so spry it was halfway up the stairs before we could stop it"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ag做,代理做+ile……的→能做的→灵活的
ag做,代理做+ency状态;机构→代理机构
ag做,代理做+enda表示复数→做的事情→议程
ag做,代理做+ent……人→做的人→代理人;作用因素
agile[adj.灵活的,敏捷的]+ity性质,特性→n.敏捷, 活泼
agitate[v.鼓动;搅动]+ion动作或状态→n.鼓动,煽动
co共同+agent[n.作用因素;代理人]→共同做的人
counter反+agent作用因素→反作用→反抗力
re再+agent作用→再次作用→反应,引申为化学试剂
ag做,代理做+it+ate表动作→反复作→鼓动
